column2: deliver the text of tweets from anyone i follow via email
when the room 's humidity falls below NUMBER_0 in the room play something on my speaker
please post the live feed photo of my new security camera on twitter and caption it person and i hope you have a great day
column3: monitor ( @security-camera.current_event ) => @com.twitter.post_picture param:caption:String = " person and i hope you have a great day " on param:picture_url:Entity(tt:picture) = param:picture_url:Entity(tt:picture)

column2: once it stops snowing in LOCATION_0 , get the steps from fitbit
column3: ( edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location:Location = LOCATION_0 ) ) on not param:status:Enum(raining,cloudy,sunny,snowy,sleety,drizzling,windy) == enum:snowy ) => ( @com.fitbit.getsteps ) => notify

column2: reset my thermostat reading if i get a tweet
notify me of the instagram pictures with filter brannan when there is a new article in the world section of the washington post
column3: ( monitor ( @com.washingtonpost.get_article param:section:Enum(politics,opinions,local,sports,national,world,business,lifestyle) = enum:world ) ) => ( ( @com.instagram.get_pictures ) filter param:filter:Entity(com.instagram:filter) == " brannan " ^^com.instagram:filter ) => notify

column2: retrieve my current location when it stops snowing in work
column3: ( edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location:Location = location:work ) ) on not param:status:Enum(raining,cloudy,sunny,snowy,sleety,drizzling,windy) == enum:snowy ) => ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) => notify

column2: show me my icalendar events when zackeriah uploads a new picture on tumblr
change my thermostat to NUMBER_0 degrees when someone i follow makes a tweet
tell me the direct message i got on twitter when an event organized by jouanna mills from my calendar is about to start
column3: ( edge ( monitor ( ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar.list_events ) filter param:organizer:String == " jouanna mills " ) ) on param:status:Enum(scheduled,upcoming,started,ended) == enum:started ) => ( @com.twitter.direct_messages ) => notify
